Dialogue: Hello ... You must be wondering where you are.
I'm your Memory Core! I keep track of all of your memories.
I've noticed that for a while now, you've had something on your mind ... something you're thinking more about nowadays.
Well I'm here to help you reflect on these memories! Once you're done talking with me, I'll leave you on your way.
I'd say you're ready, one more press of that 'e' key and I'll get out of your hair! Take a look south west of here when im gone, see ya!
